name: Momentic
headline: The modern standard for software testing
description: Momentic is the most advanced AI platform for testing. We're accelerating engineering teams at companies like Retool, Podium, Chegg, Runway, and many more.

founders.name: Wei-Wei Wu, Founder
founders.description: Wei-Wei Wu is a co-founder and CEO of Momentic. Previously, he worked at Assembled, building infrastructure and real-time features. Before that, he was the first employee and founding engineer at Nashi, a startup tackling RTO during Covid, which was acquired by Density in 2021.

founders.name: Jeff An, Founder
founders.description: I'm a curious and driven technical founder hailing from Toronto, Canada. I love up-leveling others through my work and after graduating from the University of Waterloo, I found my calling in cloud and test infrastructure at companies like Splunk, Google, and Robinhood. Aside from engineering, I love traveling the world (over 100K miles flown in 2023!), playing piano, and hiking.

markdown:
raw_markdown='[![Momentic](https://momentic.ai/_next/static/media/logo-with-text.934c1e55.svg)](https://momentic.ai/</>)

  * [Blog](https://momentic.ai/</blog>)

  * [Sign in](https://momentic.ai/</app>)
  * [Book a demo](https://momentic.ai/</sales>)


# Ship fast with AI testing.
Momentic is the modern standard for software testing. Streamline regression testing, production monitoring, and UI automation.
[Book a demo](https://momentic.ai/</sales>)[Join the waitlist](https://momentic.ai/</contact>)
Trusted by teams at
![chegg](https://momentic.ai/_next/static/media/chegg.11873a33.svg)
![quora](https://momentic.ai/_next/static/media/quora.dd3f0566.svg)
![retool](https://momentic.ai/_next/static/media/retool.4eac2a15.svg)
![podium](https://momentic.ai/_next/static/media/podium.33a1b1d4.svg)
![runway](https://momentic.ai/_next/static/media/runway.2b7b218f.svg)
![collectors](https://momentic.ai/_next/static/media/collectors.26c62758.svg)
![kumo](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fkumo.064b4eca.png&w=640&q=75)
![fiddler](https://momentic.ai/_next/static/media/fiddler.a53c368f.svg)
![gptzero](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fgptzero.1753c26e.webp&w=1080&q=75)
![vapi](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fvapi.9627929b.png&w=750&q=75)
![Build](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Feditor.6587f3da.png&w=3840&q=75)
BuildGenerateDebugAnalyze
## Make test automation easy with AI
Momentic is simple to set up, easy to maintain, and accelerates your team.
### Speed up dev and QA cycles
Create and deploy tests faster with our intuitive low-code editor. Use the local app to seamlessly integrate with developer workflows.
### Automatically fix flaky tests
Automated test maintenance saves valuable time for new features and enhancements. Our AI adapts to your applications and gets smarter the more you test!
### Test anywhere, anytime
Run using our cloud, locally, in CI/CD pipelines, or behind private networks. Schedule with cron or execute programmatically with the CLI.
### A culture of engineering excellence
Empower engineers to test without the overhead of maintaining flaky scripts. Give your team the ownership to build and maintain a robust test suite.
## Built for modern teams
Designed to support both technical and non-technical teams.
![AI-powered assertions](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fassertion.1e26a034.png&w=1200&q=75)
### AI-powered assertions
Craft assertions from any logical statement or visual condition. Anything that can be expressed in natural language can be asserted.
[Assertions guide](https://momentic.ai/</docs/platform/assertions>)
![Auto-healing locators](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flocator.f125d137.png&w=1200&q=75)
### Auto-healing locators
Instead of XPath or CSS selectors, our AI locates elements based on a simple description. No need to worry about changes in the DOM.
[Locators guide](https://momentic.ai/</docs/platform/locating-elements>)
![Intuitive low-code editor](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Feditor.efda0fb4.png&w=1200&q=75)
### Intuitive low-code editor
The Momentic editor allows you to create and edit tests easily. See updates in real time. View console logs, network logs, and debug errors live.
[Editor guide](https://momentic.ai/</docs/platform/test-context>)
![Store in Version Control](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcode.75065d9f.png&w=1200&q=75)
### Store in Version Control
Momentic tests are just YAML files that can be edited with the local app. Colocate them with your features and easily keep them in sync.
[Git repo demo](https://momentic.ai/<https:/github.com/momentic-ai/github-actions-demo>)
![Works 100% locally](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Frunning.c13bdfb0.png&w=1200&q=75)
### Works 100% locally
The Momentic CLI is distributed via NPM and lets you test local and private deployments. Think localhost:3000 or behind a VPN.
[Local app guide](https://momentic.ai/</docs/cli/v1/run-tests-locally>)
## Join industry leaders
See what our customers have to say about Momentic.
"With Momentic, we were able to completely eliminate our manual QA process, freeing up valuable engineering time for project work!"
![company](https://momentic.ai/_next/static/media/retool.4eac2a15.svg)
SriramEng Lead
![Sriram](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsriram.50048dee.png&w=96&q=75)
"I just ran our first automated eval across 110 prompts. This would have taken us well over an hour to run manually, and I kicked it off in 5 seconds, and it was done running in 14 min, without me needing to do a thing during that time. HUGE for us."
![company](https://momentic.ai/_next/static/media/runway.2b7b218f.svg)
MikeEng Manager
![Mike](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmike.7953e4fc.jpeg&w=96&q=75)
"The reason I was enamored by you guys was (a) works for us in prod, (b) super great UX and (c) incredible velocity and delivery. It is so easy to use that a jr dev can use on his first day!"
![company](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbest-parents.9751a293.png&w=1080&q=75)
AdityaCTO
![Aditya](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Faditya.196464db.png&w=96&q=75)
"Momentic makes it 3x faster for our team to write and maintain end to end tests. Startups win by shipping faster and better, and Momentic enabled us to do exactly that."
![company](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fgptzero.1753c26e.webp&w=1080&q=75)
AlexCTO
![Alex](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Falex.9729d245.png&w=96&q=75)
"The first time we broke our production dashboard, I knew it was time to add e2e tests. Then came the dread of managing Selenium. Thankfully found Momentic. Rest is history."
![company](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fvapi.9627929b.png&w=750&q=75)
NikhilCTO
![Nikhil](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fnikhil.761792e9.png&w=96&q=75)
"Momentic is very helpful. It enables our team to create UI tests in an easy way. It was significantly faster and more accurate than other AI testing tools we tried."
![company](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fkumo.064b4eca.png&w=640&q=75)
YiwenEng Lead
![Yiwen](https://momentic.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fyiwen.45c490d2.jpeg&w=96&q=75)
## Frequently asked questions
Got questions? We've got answers.
### How does Momentic's AI work?
Momentic's platform contains many multi-modal AI models trained for specific tasks like locating elements or evaluating assertions.
### How reliable is Momentic?
### How fast is it to build tests in Momentic?
### Is there a big learning curve for Momentic?
### Do you generate Playwright code?
### Can you run against pull requests, merges, and commits?
### Do you support mobile (iOS, Android) and desktop (Electron)?
### Do you support Chrome, Safari, and Firefox?

generated_description:
**Momentic: Revolutionizing Software Testing with AI**

Founded in 2023 and incubated in Y Combinator Batch W24, Momentic is making waves as a pioneering AI platform aimed at modernizing the software testing landscape. Headquartered in San Francisco, this nimble team of six is already partnering with notable engineering groups at companies like Retool, Podium, Chegg, and Runway. Momentic claims to set the "modern standard for software testing," which is a bold statement, but they back it up with innovative features that resonate particularly well with both developer and non-developer teams.

### What Momentic Offers:

1. **Speed and Efficiency**: With their intuitive low-code editor, Momentic allows teams to create and deploy tests faster than ever. This integration into developer workflows means less friction and more shipping.

2. **AI-Powered Automation**: Their technology intelligently handles the often-frustrating issue of flaky tests, automatically adapting and improving over time. This means engineers can focus on new features rather than maintenance headaches.

3. **Flexibility in Testing**: Whether in the cloud, locally, or even behind private networks, Momentic provides the versatility to run tests anytime and anywhere. Their CI/CD pipeline compatibility further enhances the appeal for modern engineering teams.

4. **User-Centric Design**: Momentic caters to teams held back by the complexities of traditional testing tools. It combines ease of use with powerful capabilities, enabling even junior developers to take part in creating automated tests right from their first day on the job.

### Key Features:

- **AI-Powered Assertions**: Users can create assertions in natural language, making the platform approachable for everyone.
- **Auto-Healing Locators**: Forget about the maintenance of conventional locators—Momentic locates elements based on descriptions, making test scripts resilient to changes.
- **Version Control Friendly**: Test files are stored in YAML format, making them easy to edit and sync alongside application features.

### Testimonials:

Momentic’s impact is illustrated through endorsements from various engineering leads who highlight how the platform has dramatically decreased manual QA efforts and boosted productivity. Users have noted the simplicity of getting results—one developer shared they could run extensive evaluations in a fraction of the time it used to take them manually.

If you’re looking to enhance your testing processes and leverage the benefits of AI, Momentic presents a compelling case. You can explore more about them or even book a demo through their website: [momentic.ai](https://momentic.ai).

In summary, Momentic seems to understand the modern developer’s challenges and has engineered an AI solution that not only addresses these but does so in a way that feels accessible and powerful. Whether you’re a startup looking to scale fast or an established company aiming to streamline, Momentic might just be the tool you need for your software testing arsenal.
